info.name: FOODFAST - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API test collection covering ALL endpoints in FOODFAST system (100+ APIs)

request.description:
Login as Admin user. Default credentials:
- Email: admin@foodfast.com
- Password: Admin123!

Note: Update credentials based on your database seeded data

Login as Restaurant user. Default credentials:
- Email: restaurant@test.com
- Password: Restaurant123!

Note: Update credentials based on your database seeded data.
The restaurantId will be automatically saved to collection variables.
Get current logged-in user information (works for all roles: user, restaurant, admin)
Logout current user and clear token
Restaurant updates order status. Valid statuses: confirmed, preparing, ready, picked_up, delivering, delivered, cancelled
Restaurant confirms they handed the order to the drone. Order status must be 'ready' and drone must be assigned.
Customer confirms they received the order successfully

exec: console.log('\n⚠️ IMPORTANT: Copy payment URL and open in browser to complete payment');

query.description: You need to calculate this properly

request.description:
⚠️ NOTE: This is a mock request. In reality, VNPay will redirect with proper signature.
Use this to understand the return format only.

⚠️ NOTE: This is normally called by VNPay server, not client.
Use this to test IPN handling only.
Prepare data to query transaction status from VNPay

Prepare refund data to send to VNPay.
transType: 02 = Full refund, 03 = Partial refund
Get list of available payment methods (COD, VNPay, Momo)
Admin processes VNPay refund for cancelled orders
Check VNPay transaction status by transaction ID
Verify VNPay secure hash signature
Get all available vouchers for a restaurant
Validate if a voucher code can be applied to an order
Get all active promotions for a restaurant
Get user's voucher usage history
Create a review after order is delivered
Get reviews for a specific restaurant
Get reviews for a specific product
Get list of available drones
Assign a drone to deliver an order
Get detailed information about a specific drone
Update drone's current location and battery level
Admin view all orders with filtering
Get all pending refund requests
Admin approves or rejects refund request
Get system statistics and analytics
Admin/Restaurant only
Restaurant only - Get categories with their products
Admin only
Public endpoint to check if email already exists
Admin only - Get user statistics
Admin only - Get all refund requests
Admin processes refund request
Get refund processing logs for an order
Get overall system statistics
Upload a single image to Cloudinary
Upload multiple images (max 10)
Admin only - Delete image from Cloudinary
